name: Sweet Dreams (argo.nautic games)
description:
Welcome to Sweet Dreams!

Every parent is confronted with these nights: your baby is tormented by nightmares and only you can give your child a peaceful sleep by carrying him through the night, avoiding any nightmares that could disturb your baby's sleep.

How to play

Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate and the space bar to perform a dashing move.  

Try to avoid the purple nightmares as long as possible. You can collect hearts to restore your health.

Trivia

This is my first game ever made finished based on the udemy tutorial of blackthornprod. Everything is made on my own, except the sounds and music (made by a friend of mine).

Feel free to comment feedback down below <3
